headline: Gutfeld: Time for the GOP candidates to call out cop haters
subHeadline: We are witnessing a deliberate well-funded attempt to rupture western society by isolating law enforcement from the people they serve.

utterances.speaker: TRAHERN CREWS, BLACK LIVES MATTER ST. PAUL ORGANIZER
utterances.sentences: It was very exciting. It was so exciting that I think the police, who were along escorting the march or the officer leading the parade, kept talking into his microphone and saying things to the crowd, like stay off the medium, do that. He was laughing and joking with the marchers. So then marchers kind of started chanting that towards him. TRAHERN CREWS, BLACK LIVES MATTER ST. PAUL ORGANIZER

But hey, maybe demanding more dead cops was all in good fun, like if cops chanted, "Let's kill all the activists." Yeah, that would go over well. Chris Hayes would have had a cow, which would have doubled his demo. This is our world these days, where you can blame a massacre on an inanimate object like a flag, but dismiss a real call for mass murder as a joke. utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED MALE
utterances.utterance: What do we want? So I have a solution. If you hate cops so much, why not sign a pledge never to call on them? Put your spine where your mouth is.
